subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Beating Hofstra was once all but automatic for St. John’s, but over the past four years Hofstra has won four consecutive games against the Red Storm by an average of 13 points.
snippet: Beating Hofstra was once all but automatic for St. John’s, but over the past four years Hofstra has won four consecutive games against the Red Storm by an average of 13 points.
